html:
12.27.20  12:18 pm   Im sure this has been asked before but whatever. Your style is creative and a lot different than others. How? Why? What?

      here's how i did it: i imitated everyone until i ran out of people to imitate but still wanted to keep doing stuff

12.27.20  10:32 am    Bill why you so good?

      that is part of an experiment, where i am experimenting with various different levels of quality

12.27.20  10:21 am   12.23.20  9:33 pm in what way are you an idiot

      think of it like this: imagine you have a great idea for a ............. jellybean. let's say, you think of a triangle jellybean. and you think "wow, i just thought of a triangle jellybean". a lot of people try very hard to think of jellybeans, and can't. But you've done it. you've thought of a jellybean. so you get to show the whole town the jelly bean. pretty cool. So essentially you've already won. all you gotta do is make the jellybean, then make a house to put the jellybean in, for the town to come see the jellybean.

12.27.20  10:03 am   What's the power house of the cell?

      you might have to do it

12.27.20  7:52 am   Where did you get the inspiration for your unique songs?

      from the world, which is also unique

12.27.20  7:31 am   If I were to ask you another question on new years eve would you respond on the 1st day of the next year?

      it should be within 36 hours or less, of when you asked it

12.27.20  4:05 am   How many songs have you made in total

      not enough

12.27.20  3:51 am   At the top of this page why is the Q swapped with the U and vice versa

      it's like when you see some one has done a 'hair-do'. i've done that using text

12.27.20  2:34 am   why do i find this website so aesthetic

      because it............... exists

12.27.20  1:06 am   how are you so cool?

      by following every rule and regulation

12.27.20  1:04 am   i'm in creative jail, can you give me the key pls

thx

      go one step outward. so, if you are putting on a scene with objects inside a glass...... now think outward and figure out what scene the glass is in. So now it's a scene with a glass on a table. Now think outward and figure out what scene the table is in. so now it's a scene with a table in a room..... keep thinking this way

12.27.20  12:56 am   Why do u art?

      sometimes it's the only way to get the message across

12.27.20  12:34 am   what language do you know the most besides english?

      music

12.27.20  12:23 am   is piano percussion or string

      computer

12.26.20  11:58 pm   are there any videos or content that you've made that you think could have been better if you put more effort into it?

      yes but then i would have had to sacrifice the possible production of another video

12.26.20  11:44 pm   Dear Bill, I just finished a small section of composing in a music course, and I wanted to say, I respect you so much as a musician and composer. Do melodies just come to your head randomly usually?

     nothing's random. they come to me all the time

     Or do you sit and really think about it?

      sometimes i do that, despite the fact that it really doesn't work

12.26.20  11:06 pm   How has christmas? Good or horrible and utterly terrible and just downright disgusting.

      must have been normal because i didn't notice it

12.26.20  10:56 pm   how do you find direction in life

      go in any direction, and it will find you

12.26.20  10:45 pm   How to stop caring so much what others think of me?

      start thinking things of them

12.26.20  10:39 pm   did any artist inspire you to create music? if so, who?

      all of them

12.26.20  10:00 pm   Do you have a rough estimate for when any new videos will be released?

     yes but my estimates are usually wrong

     Or are you just done?

      barely even started

12.26.20  9:10 pm   what motivates you to make music (your the first person i thought of as a musician)

      everything i've ever seen or heard, or thought of

12.26.20  8:18 pm   Why did the chicken cross the road?

      what my client (the chicken) and i are wondering is why was a road built across the chicken's path

12.26.20  8:17 pm   i am inspired by the fact that you get your inspiration from other people in order to inspire them, is this your intention

      inspiration comes from everywhere. there is nothing i can do about that

12.26.20  7:44 pm   do you like capital letters?

      yes

12.26.20  7:16 pm   would you be interested in hosting a podcast with me?

      yes

12.26.20  6:37 pm   What's your favorite chord to play on the piano? 

      that all changes depending on what was played previously. or, what else happened in the world previously

12.26.20  6:26 pm   are there better fuels for me when it comes to doing projects aside from ideas, motivation, and pure anger

      you are missing one element which is pure joy

12.26.20  6:06 pm   none of your answers make any sense, and yet they also make complete sense. how do you achieve this

      that's easy. all you have to do is step over to the dark side

12.26.20  5:52 pm   you said you play what do we know to unconfuse yourself. how do you play it?

      just start listing things you know

12.26.20  5:45 pm   How do you stop the world from being terrible?

      try to look at the big picture

12.26.20  5:32 pm   How can I read music?

      you can tell what the notes are from where the dots are, and when the notes are from how the stems, flags, and beams are configured

12.26.20  5:25 pm   what is your opinion on the industrial revolution

      pretty good. they should do it again some time

12.26.20  5:08 pm   What is your take on the scientific method?

      it's got to be one of my top 5 favorite methods

12.26.20  4:49 pm   if you could instantly master any instrument and be at least equally as proficient as your main instrument right now, what would it be?

      guitar

12.26.20  4:21 pm   what's your favorite type of pizza

      perfect

12.26.20  3:42 pm   "It's turning into a bad year
All the things I'm supposed to do
And the places I'm supposed to go
Are canceled"

How did you know?

      i knew my previous conception of where the song might be headed, prior to that point, should probably be put on hold, because the song was probably meant to be a bit adventurous

12.26.20  3:10 pm   What's your opinion on floors

      love them. probably too much. i'm addicted to them

12.26.20  2:02 pm   For your purely instrumental videos, do you have an idea of what's on screen as you're writing the music?

     for most of those, the video is written first

12.26.20  12:57 pm   opinion on the september 11 memorial?

      don't fall in

12.26.20  12:54 pm   Where did you learn your technique for quickly prime factorising numbers in your head?

      at home, and in the work place

12.26.20  12:34 pm   did you mean to predict 2020 with "i just did a bad thing"

      no, but, 2020 was already predicted long ago, thanks to the gregorian calendar

12.26.20  12:31 pm   What was the biggest surprise when you opened this questions page?

      probably all the questions

12.26.20  12:16 pm   Have you ever thought about cooking meth with your high school chemistry teacher?

      no

12.26.20  11:46 am   do you ever confuse yourself?

     yes

     how do you unconfuse yourself?

      play 'what do we know'

12.26.20  10:44 am   Whats your favorite song?

      i haven't found it yet, that's why i keep making new ones just in case

12.26.20  9:16 am   ur music is amazinf
can you mak more plz

      sure

12.26.20  9:04 am   whats your opinion on potatoes

      the flavor overwhelms me

12.26.20  8:13 am   heard you were studying 3d animation. if i remember correctly, the quarks and stuff from history of the world are 3d. what have been some interesting/fun things to learn for 3d animation and what's the latest pain-in-the-ass problem you've been experiencing with it?

      it turns out the main problem is a problem with my brain. normally, the human brain has an important feature, called the infinity warning. it warns you whenever you are trying to do infinity. it says, 'warning, you are trying to do infinity, which is not possible so please stop now so your feelings don't get hurt from how impossible it would be to do infinity', well that part of my brain is unfortunately missing. So in a field like 3D animation, this problem is compounded significantly

12.26.20  8:02 am   your music is amazing, when did you start making tunes?

      a long long time ago
